author: David Harrison
title: Analysis: Jobs Report Could Boost Fed Support for Faster Pace of Rate Rises
text:
Fridayâ€™s jobs report will reassure the Federal Reserve it is on the right track in its plan to raise interest rates several more times this year. The question that remains is whether officials will see the need to accelerate the pace of rate increases.
Officials penciled in three quarter-point moves for 2018 at their December policy meeting, but several officials have since raised the possibility of four rate increases.
